page.title: 14SQUARE
page.content:
{Square} like it's name is played in a square with a ball. The object is to keep the ball in the square as long as possible. If the ball goes out of square,the person who touched it last is out. The winner is the person who is still in at the end. RULES: PEOPLE MUST TRY TO KEEP THE BALL IN THE SQUARE. IF THEY LET IT GO THEY ARE OUT.WHEN YOU ARE OUT YOU MUST GO OUT OF THE SQUARE. YOU CAN ALSO BE CAUGHT OUT. SOME PEOPLE PLAY THAT THE WINNER GETS TWO POINTS AND SECOND GETS ONE POINT. ANY AMOUNT OF PEOPLE CAN PLAY.
THERE IS A MUCH ROUGHER GAME CALLED BOOT SQUARE WITH THE SAME RULES, BUT IF YOU ARE "OUT" YOU HAVE TO TRY TO RUN IN AND OUT OF THE SQUARE WITHOUT GETTING KICKED.
